Federation Manager
famAdminTools.zip
checksum=famAdminTools.zip.sha 		Federation Manager Commandline Tool, this tool is used to manage service configuration and metadata.
openfm.war
checksum=openfm.war.sha 		Federation Manager WAR file, this WAR is deployable on all J2EE compliant Web Container. After deploying it, you can configure the server via a JSP page.
openfm-samples.war
checksum=openfm-samples.war.sha 		Federation Manager WAR file with server samples, this WAR is a super set of openfm.war with some server side samples to demonstrate Identity Federation and Web Services features.
openfm-clientsamples.war
checksum=openfm-clientsamples.war.sha 		Federation Manager Client Samples WAR file, this WAR is deployable on all J2EE compliant Web Container. After deploying it, you can configure the client sample to communicate with a server instance.
fmclientsdk.jar
checksum=fmclientsdk.jar.sha 		Federation Manager Client SDK jar file, this jar could be used in a client application to communicate with a server instance.
openfm-server-test.zip
checksum=openfm-server-test.zip.sha 		Developer's Unit Test (Server)
